text: visala pramanayaka yuddhajida vastun oba atpat kara gannehuya yayi allah obata porondu di tibuni. meya obata ita ikmanin laba dunneya. (obata saturan vana ema) minisunge atda obagen æt kara valakva hæriyeya. (meya) visvasavantayinta ek sadhakayak bavata pat kirima sandahada, obava rju margayehi yamata sælæsvima sandahada, (mese dayava pahala kaleya)
